mil7.6.8:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, jalūkā yattha allīyati, tattheva daḷhaṁ allīyitvā ruhiraṁ pivati;
mil7.6.8:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena yasmiṁ ārammaṇe cittaṁ allīyati,
mil7.6.8:1.3_2: taṁ ārammaṇaṁ vaṇṇato ca saṇṭhānato ca disato ca okāsato ca paricchedato ca liṅgato ca nimittato ca daḷhaṁ
mil7.6.8:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, jalūkāya ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
